title: Deep Night
overview: Deep Night Club is a host club that is famous for its acrobatic shows which are different from other bars. It is owned by Madame Freya. She is a mother of Khemthit who will take care of business after Freya's retirement. Khemthit doesn't really like this bar, but when he meets Vela, a university colleague and also top host here, he's fascinated and wants to open his heart to him and this profession. Nevertheless, because of social status differences, it makes this love story not too easy and both of them need to prove this belief altogether. Still, Madame Freya can't open her heart to accept that her son falls in love with her own employee and has Meiji, her best friend beside to go through difficult time. Khemthit must prove both his mother and Vela and he has to start working from the lowest position.
